info.name: Oscar Chair
info.description: Charming and luxurious, our glamorous new Oscar range includes a loveseat, chair and bar stool; all designed to make an impact. Chic curves and a deep buttoned back are the hallmarks of these pieces, with an optional swivel plinth and sumptuous layers of padding as standard.</br></br>TECHNICAL INFORMATION</br>Piping detail on arms, seat, scatter & back</br>Deep buttoning on back</br><Detachable plinth</br>Available with a swivel base
